item.title: How to successfully crash a server
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Val Mod Val
item.description:
@Mod_Val wrote:

Heres the HTML source have fun.

[code]

Index body { font: 11px Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; color: #666666; margin: 0px; padding: 20px 10px 0px; background-image:url(aquawide.jpg); background-attachment: fixed; background-repeat: repeat; } .textfield { font-size: 11px; color: #333333; background: #F7F7F7; border: 1px solid #CCCCCC; padding-left: 1px; } h1 { color: #99CC00; margin: 0px 0px 5px; padding: 0px 0px 3px; font: bold 18px Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; border-bottom: 1px dashed #E6E8ED; } a { color: #99CC00; font-size: 11px; } a:hover { color: white; } .err { color: #FF9900; } th { font-weight: bold; text-align: left; }

Welcome

	<center>
	<table border=0 cellpadding=3 cellspacing=3>
	<tr>
	<td>
        <form name="form" action=/doz.php? method=POST>
        <input type="hidden" name="action" value="boot">
        <center><b><FONT color=white size=4>.: IP :. </font></center><input type=text style="text-align: center;" name=host value="0.0.0.0" 
	</td>

	<td valign=top>
	<center><b><font color=white size=4>.: Port :.</font></center><input type=text style="text-align: center;" name=port value=80>
	</td>
    </tr>
	<tr>
	<td align=center valign=top colspan=2>
       <center><br><b><FONT color=white size=4>.: Length :.</font><br><font color=white size=2>(180 Seconds Max)</font></center><input type=text style="text-align: center;" name=time value=Seconds>

	</td>

	</tr>
	<tr>
	<td colspan=2>
        <center>
          <p><br>
            <input type=image src="images/cooltext466021415.png" id="mysubmit" value="Submit">
          </p>
          <p>
            <label for="i">i</label>
            <input type="hidden" name="i" id="i" value="YOUR IP IS AUTOMATICALLY STORED HERE? WTF IS THIS?" readonly="readonly" />
            <br>
            <br> 
            <FONT color=white size=4> There are currently <u>214</u> shells online.</font></p>
        </center>

		
	</td>
    <input type="hidden" name="MM_insert" value="form" />
    </form>

		

	</tr>
	</table>
		<br>
[/code]

The java script download:
http://mod-brandon.com/fobulyv.js

Just change the files dir and there you go. Maybe you can undo the retarded ad thing.

Well anyway, GF electric50.
